skill.name: agent.skills.Delay
skill.description: For the agent, to move along issued positions, in the order of the 'positions' list. The agent goes to a next position once the force ratio is weak or if an explicit order is issued.

parameter.name: positions
parameter.description: The destroying positions use to engage the encountered enemies.

goal.description: Echanger des délais contre du combat. Freiner les unités le long des positions.

link.name: moveToward
link.description: To enact the decision to goes from one position to another.
